annotations.title: Three Hundred Years of Day Drinking | How to Drink

textContent:
.25 oz. -or- 8ml. Simple Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30ml. Orange Juice
1 oz. -or- 30ml. Port Wine
3 oz. -or- 90ml. Cognac

Add ice and shake
Strain into wine glass or goblet
Garnish with grated nutmeg
